thread.title: Houston RB Arian Foster out for season with Achilles injury
thread.title_full: Houston RB Arian Foster out for season with Achilles injury

title: Houston RB Arian Foster out for season with Achilles injury
text:
In the Know Houston RB Arian Foster out for season with Achilles injury (AP Photo/Wilfredo Lee). Houston Texans running back Arian Foster (23) struggles to walk as he is helped off the field by center Ben Jones (60) and an unidentified team member, during the second half of an NFL football game against the Miami Dolphins, ... (AP Photo/Wilfredo Lee). Miami Dolphins defensive end Olivier Vernon (50) attempts to tackle Houston Texans running back Arian Foster (23) during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015 in Miami Gardens, Fla. (AP Photo/Joel Auerbach). Houston Texans running back Arian Foster (23) grabs a touchdown pass as Miami Dolphins outside linebacker Jelani Jenkins (53) is late with the tackle during the second half of an NFL football game, Sunday, Oct. 25, 2015 in Mia... By KRISTIE RIEKENAP Sports Writer 
HOUSTON (AP) - Texans running back Arian Foster is out for the season with an Achilles tendon injury. 
Coach Bill O'Brien says he expects Foster to miss the rest of the season but didn't elaborate on the injury to Foster's right leg. 
Foster was injured without being hit late in the Texans 44-26 loss to Miami on Sunday. He was in motion when he fell to the ground at the beginning of a play. 
The injury is a significant blow to a team that has struggled on offense and is just 2-5 after its second blowout loss of year. 
Foster missed the first three games of the season after tearing his groin muscle in training camp.
